name: The Wanderer (itch) (Erica)
description:
The Wanderer is a short visual-novel narrative game about fighting zombies and surviving in a post-apocalyptic world.  

  • Visual Novel, Narrative Game
  • Post-Apocalyptic, Zombies
  • Meaningful Choice 
    • 4 Different Endings 

Credits

  • Marko Kuper - Programmer 
  • Ethan Clark-Maracle - Artist (Character & UI Art)
  • Erica Chiem - Game Writer 

Background Images - Royalty-free photos taken from Pixabay.com

Made with Unity (and Fungus)

(GDDV106-301 Development Concepts - Final Assignment - 2 Weeks)
